item.title: Changing stat requirements of an item

i remember something where there was a thing where you just open it and look for item and change the requirements i know i did it before

item.source: Changing stat requirements of an item

item.title: Changing stat requirements of an item
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

easier option:
in boolean process()
add this

if(playerLevel[X1] <= X2 && playerEquipment[playerX3] == X4 == true) { // coded by Le Hawtz
remove(playerEquipment[playerX3], 1);
sendMessage("You Need X2 X5 To Wear This Item!");

replace the following
X1-the number id of the level needed
X2-1 less than the level required, (for it requiring 40, i would put 39)
X3-the word id of the equipment slot, example
Cape
Helmet
to make
playerCape
or
playerHelmet
X4-the id of the item required
X5-name of the skill

harder (less laggy) option:
make this void

public void itemStatRequirments() {
}

then in

case 121:

add this

itemStatRequirments();

Now, in the void you would add the same thing as in process, INCLUDING the } and {

Read full topic
